languages.text: "Расскажи мне о скоморохе Блефе. Чем он завоевал расположение губернатора?"

traits.locale_text: "Расскажи мне о скоморохе Блефе. Чем он завоевал расположение губернатора?"

languages.text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"
languages.original_text: "Расскажи мне о скоморохе Блефе. Чем он завоевал расположение губернатора?"

traits.locale_text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"
"Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"
"Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"
"Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"
"Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"

languages.text: “和我说说那个叫‘闹闹’的小丑吧？他是怎么赢得总督青睐的？”
languages.original_text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"

traits.locale_text: “和我说说那个叫‘闹闹’的小丑吧？他是怎么赢得总督青睐的？”

languages.text: «Háblame de Farol, el bufón. ¿Cómo ha conseguido granjearse el favor del gobernador?».
languages.original_text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"

traits.locale_text: «Háblame de Farol, el bufón. ¿Cómo ha conseguido granjearse el favor del gobernador?».

languages.text: "Bana soytarı Kurusıkı'dan bahset. Valinin gözüne nasıl girdi?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"

traits.locale_text: "Bana soytarı Kurusıkı'dan bahset. Valinin gözüne nasıl girdi?"

languages.text: 「道化のブラフについて教えてくれ。どやって彼は総督に気に入られたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"

traits.locale_text: 「道化のブラフについて教えてくれ。どやって彼は総督に気に入られたんだ？」

languages.text: « Parlez-moi de Bluff, le bouffon. Comment a-t-il gagné les faveurs du gouverneur ? »
languages.original_text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"

traits.locale_text: « Parlez-moi de Bluff, le bouffon. Comment a-t-il gagné les faveurs du gouverneur ? »

languages.text: "Erzählt mir von Bluff, dem Narren. Wie hat er die Gunst des Gouverneurs gewonnen?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me about Bluff, the fool. How did he win the governor's favour?"

traits.locale_text: "Erzählt mir von Bluff, dem Narren. Wie hat er die Gunst des Gouverneurs gewonnen?"
